articles.title: Monkeypox outbreak: Drugmaker SIGA says EU authorities seeking to stockpile its smallpox antiviral - euronews
articles.description: Shares in companies that make antiviral drugs to fight smallpox and related viruses have soared as monkeypox cases multiply in Europe and North America.READ ...

articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: What Is Monkeypox, Where Is It Spreading? - VOA Learning English
articles.description: European and American health officials have identified several cases of monkeypox recently, mostly in young men. The cases reported in Europe and the United States are raising concern because the disease has rarely appeared outside of Africa.
